segments.text: May we see the wine list please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Our special wine today is a 1989 Chardonnay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds pretty good ! How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's $ 4.25 cents by the glass . The whole bottle is $ 22.5 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll need to see your ID please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry about the inconvenience , you look so young . I had make sure you are over 21 years old .
segments.speaker: S2
